title: fix one off bug
description:
Our last PR was to fix an issue where tracked series books were incorrectly showing One-Off badges.

Root cause: The is_one_off column existed in production but had incorrect values (likely all True). The initial migration only populated values when first creating the column.

Fix: Updated migration to check if any books have is_one_off = True, and if so, sets ALL books to is_one_off = False (since no one-offs are currently configured). Only runs once.

PRs:
- #15 (merged) - initial fix attempt
- #17 (open) - simplified fix
